title: Anne Rice - The Vampire Chronicles (Mobi)
description:
A collection of The Vampire Chronicles in mobi format for the Kindle.

01 - Interview with the Vampire (1976)
02 - The Vampire Lestat (1985)
03 - The Queen of the Damned (1988)
04 - The Tale of the Body Thief (1992)
05 - Memnoch the Devil (1995)
06 - The Vampire Armand (1998)
07 - Merrick (2000)
08 - Blood and Gold (2001)
09 - Blackwood Farm (2002)
10 - Blood Canticle (2003
